entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:19PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...GUSTY WINDS AND HIGH WAVES EXPECTED TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY... A strong low will bring impactful weather to Southwest Alaska, primarily for the Greater Bristol Bay region, tonight through Friday.
